content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)
### Copper cable factory
Not present
### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and pipe group at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)
### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using entities that are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that entities are connected to the electric network before using them.
### Errors when using pipe groups that are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before using them.
### Errors when using entities that are waiting for source items
- Ensure that entities have source items before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
